message.name: ERR_SAMPLESPORTINGACTIVITY_XRV_PAYMENTAMOUNT_TOTALSPORTINGACTIVITYEXPENSEAMOUNT
message.locale: The Payment Amount must be greater than or equal to the total amount of all related Sample Sporting Activity Expenses.

message.name: ERR_SAMPLE_SPORTINGACTIVITY_XRV_SPORTINGACTIVITY_EXISTS
message.locale: A Sample Sporting Activity record of type %1s already exists for %2s for dates specified.
